= maven archetype 开发说明=

==相关名称==
  # groupId : com.company.project
  # package : com.company.project
  # version : 1.0
  # artifactId : rapid-springmvc-mybatis (rapid-struts2-ibatis) 这样的名称
  # archetypeId: rapid-springmvc-mybatis-archetype ( rapid-struts2-ibatis-archetype) 这样的名称

==项目目录结构==
src/main/java
src/test/java
src/main/webapp
src/main/resources/generator/template/project/

==项目common包==
com.company.project.common 用于存放公共代码

==模板文件存放位置==
项目的模板文件统一存放在 rapid-generator-template项目，通过 classpath:generator/template/rapid的方式进行引用.

预留给客户端自定义的模板则存放在项目内,如:
{{{
src/main/resources/generator/template/project/table/share/custom
  java_copyright.include
  java_description.include
  java_import.include
}}}
然后通过classpath: generator/template/project/table/share/custom 引用
